oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Woman in hat
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Portrait of unidentified woman in period clothing, wearing a very large plume-covered hat with a satin bow. She has a fur tippet covering her shoulders.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Calvert, Peter Ross, 1855-1931; Calvert, Ebenezer, 1850-1924
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Fur garments; Feathers; Collars; Neckwear; Women's clothing; Fashion
Women; Hats; Portrait photographs
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Box 129c; Surrogate print of this item is available in the Library Photograph Collection. Drawer 3, Folder 44
